list.title: 创建CVM
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"content":{"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":""},"Placement":{"properties":{"Zone":{"type":"string","description":""}}},"ImageId":{"type":"string","description":"镜像id"},"InstanceChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"PREPAID 预付费、POSTPAID_BY_HOUR后付费"},"InstanceChargePrepaid":{"properties":{"Period":{"type":"string","description":"单位是月"},"RenewFlag":{"type":"string","description":"NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW：通知过期且自动续费 NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：通知过期不自动续费 DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：不通知过期不自动续费"}}},"InstanceType":{"type":"string","description":"实例规格"},"SystemDisk":{"properties":{"DiskType":{"type":"string","description":"取值范围： LOCAL_BASIC：本地硬盘 LOCAL_SSD：本地SSD硬盘 CLOUD_BASIC：普通云硬盘 CLOUD_SSD：SSD云硬盘 CLOUD_PREMIUM：高性能云硬盘  默认取值：CLOUD_BASIC。"},"DiskSize":{"type":"string","description":"单位：GB。默认值为 50"}}},"DataDisks":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"DiskType":{"type":"string","description":"取值范围： LOCAL_BASIC：本地硬盘 LOCAL_SSD：本地SSD硬盘 CLOUD_BASIC：普通云硬盘 CLOUD_PREMIUM：高性能云硬盘 CLOUD_SSD：SSD云硬盘  默认取值：LOCAL_BASIC。"},"DiskSize":{"type":"string","description":"单位：GB"},"DeleteWithInstance":{"type":"string","description":"数据盘是否随子机销毁,默认取值：TRUE"}},"type":"object"}},"VirtualPrivateCloud":{"properties":{"VpcId":{"type":"string","description":"vpcid"},"SubnetId":{"type":"string","description":"子网id"},"AsVpcGateway":{"type":"string","description":"是否用作公网网关"}}},"SecurityGroupIds":{"type":"array","description":"安全组id列表"},"InternetAccessible":{"properties":{"InternetChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"网络计费类型。取值范围： BANDWIDTH_PREPAID：预付费按带宽结算 TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：流量按小时后付费 BANDWIDTH_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：带宽按小时后付费"},"InternetMaxBandwidthOut":{"type":"string","description":"单位：Mbps。默认值：0Mbps"},"PublicIpAssigned":{"type":"string","description":"是否分配公网IP"}}},"InstanceCount":{"type":"string","description":"购买实例个数／"},"InstanceName":{"type":"string","description":"实例名称"},"LoginSettings":{"properties":{"Password":{"type":"string","description":"登录密码"}}},"EnhancedService":{"properties":{"SecurityService":{"properties":{"Enabled":{"type":"string","description":"TRUE：表示开启云安全服务 FALSE：表示不开启云安全服务"}}},"MonitorService":{"properties":{"Enabled":{"type":"string","description":"TRUE：表示开启云监控服务 FALSE：表示不开启云监控服务"}}}}},"HostName":{"type":"string","description":"云服务器的主机名。"},"ActionTimer":{"properties":{"Externals":{"properties":{}},"TimerAction":{"type":"string","description":"TerminateInstances"},"ActionTime":{"type":"string","description":"2018-5-29 11:26:40"}}}}},"OriginalPrice":{"type":"string","description":"原始价格"},"TradePrice":{"type":"string","description":"观脉交易价格"},"Price":{"type":"string","description":"客户交易价格"},"orderId":{"type":"string","description":"订单id"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 启动实例
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例ID列表"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 关闭实例
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例ID列表"},"ForceStop":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否在正常关闭失败后选择强制关闭实例。取值范围： TRUE：表示在正常关闭失败后进行强制关闭 FALSE：表示在正常关闭失败后不进行强制关闭  默认取值：FALSE。"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 重启实例
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"一个或多个待操作的实例ID 每次请求批量实例的上限为100"},"ForceReboot":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否在正常重启失败后选择强制重启实例。取值范围： TRUE：表示在正常重启失败后进行强制重启 FALSE：表示在正常重启失败后不进行强制重启  默认取值：FALSE"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 修改实例的属性
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"一个或多个待操作的实例ID"},"InstanceName":{"type":"string","description":"实例名称。可任意命名，但不得超过60个字符"},"SecurityGroups":{"type":"array[string]","description":"指定实例的安全组Id列表"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 退还实例
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"一个或多个待操作的实例ID"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 查看实例列表
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceId":{"type":"string","description":"实例ID"},"VpcId":{"type":"string","description":"VPC ID"},"SubnetId":{"type":"string","description":"交换机ID"}},"type":"object"}
list.res_body:
{"properties":{"Placement":{"properties":{"Zone":{"type":"string","description":"实例所属的可用区ID"},"ProjectId":{"type":"number","description":"实例所属项目ID"},"HostIds":{"type":"string","description":"实例所属的专用宿主机ID列表"}}},"InstanceId":{"type":"string","description":"实例ID"},"InstanceType":{"type":"string","description":"实例机型"},"CPU":{"type":"number","description":"实例的CPU核数，单位：核"},"Memory":{"type":"number","description":"实例内存容量，单位：GB"},"RestrictState":{"type":"string","description":"实例业务状态。取值范围： NORMAL：表示正常状态的实例 EXPIRED：表示过期的实例 PROTECTIVELY_ISOLATED：表示被安全隔离的实例"},"InstanceName":{"type":"string","description":"实例名称"},"InstanceChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"实例计费模式。取值范围： PREPAID：表示预付费，即包年包月 POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：表示后付费，即按量计费 CDHPAID：CDH付费，即只对CDH计费，不对CDH上的实例计费"},"SystemDisk":{"properties":{"DiskType":{"type":"string","description":"系统盘类型。系统盘类型限制详见CVM实例配置。取值范围： LOCAL_BASIC：本地硬盘 LOCAL_SSD：本地SSD硬盘 CLOUD_BASIC：普通云硬盘 CLOUD_SSD：SSD云硬盘 CLOUD_PREMIUM：高性能云硬盘 默认取值：CLOUD_BASIC。"},"DiskId":{"type":"string","description":"系统盘ID。LOCAL_BASIC 和 LOCAL_SSD 类型没有ID。暂时不支持该参数。"},"DiskSize":{"type":"number","description":"系统盘大小，单位：GB。默认值为 50"}}},"DataDisks":{"type":"string","description":"实例数据盘信息。只包含随实例购买的数据盘"},"PrivateIpAddresses":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例主网卡的内网IP列表。"},"PublicIpAddresses":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例主网卡的公网IP列表"},"InternetAccessible":{"properties":{"InternetChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"网络计费类型。取值范围： BANDWIDTH_PREPAID：预付费按带宽结算 TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：流量按小时后付费 BANDWIDTH_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：带宽按小时后付费 BANDWIDTH_PACKAGE：带宽包用户 默认取值：非带宽包用户默认与子机付费类型保持一致"},"InternetMaxBandwidthOut":{"type":"number","description":"公网出带宽上限，单位：Mbps。默认值：0Mbps。不同机型带宽上限范围不一致，具体限制详见购买网络带宽。"},"PublicIpAssigned":{"type":"string","description":"是否分配公网IP。取值范围： TRUE：表示分配公网IP FALSE：表示不分配公网IP 当公网带宽大于0Mbps时，可自由选择开通与否，默认开通公网IP；当公网带宽为0，则不允许分配公网IP"}}},"VirtualPrivateCloud":{"properties":{"VpcId":{"type":"string","description":"私有网络ID，形如vpc-xxx。有效的VpcId可通过登录控制台查询；也可以调用接口 DescribeVpcEx ，从接口返回中的unVpcId字段获取。若在创建子机时VpcId与SubnetId同时传入DEFAULT，则强制使用默认vpc网络"},"SubnetId":{"type":"string","description":"私有网络子网ID，形如subnet-xxx。有效的私有网络子网ID可通过登录控制台查询；也可以调用接口 DescribeSubnets ，从接口返回中的unSubnetId字段获取。若在创建子机时SubnetId与VpcId同时传入DEFAULT，则强制使用默认vpc网络"},"AsVpcGateway":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否用作公网网关。公网网关只有在实例拥有公网IP以及处于私有网络下时才能正常使用。取值范围： TRUE：表示用作公网网关 FALSE：表示不用作公网网关 默认取值：FALSE。"},"PrivateIpAddresses":{"type":"string","description":"私有网络子网 IP 数组，在创建实例、修改实例vpc属性操作中可使用此参数。当前仅批量创建多台实例时支持传入相同子网的多个 IP"}}},"ImageId":{"type":"string","description":"生产实例所使用的镜像ID。"},"RenewFlag":{"type":"string","description":"自动续费标识。取值范围： NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：表示通知即将过期，但不自动续费 NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW：表示通知即将过期，而且自动续费 DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：表示不通知即将过期，也不自动续费"},"CreatedTime":{"type":"string","description":"创建时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，并且使用UTC时间。格式为：YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ"},"ExpiredTime":{"type":"string","description":"到期时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，并且使用UTC时间。格式为：YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ"},"OsName":{"type":"string","description":"操作系统名称"},"SecurityGroupIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例所属安全组。该参数可以通过调用 DescribeSecurityGroups 的返回值中的sgId字段来获取。"},"LoginSettings":{"properties":{"Password":{"type":"string","description":"例登录密码。不同操作系统类型密码复杂度限制不一样，具体如下： Linux实例密码必须8到16位，至少包括两项[a-z，A-Z]、[0-9] 和 [( ) ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * - + = | { } [ ] : ; ' , . ? / ]中的特殊符号。
  • Windows实例密码必须12到16位，至少包括三项[a-z]，[A-Z]，[0-9] 和 [( ) ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * - + = { } [ ] : ; ' , . ? /]中的特殊符号。 若不指定该参数，则由系统随机生成密码，并通过站内信方式通知到用户"},"KeyIds":{"type":"string","description":"密钥ID列表。关联密钥后，就可以通过对应的私钥来访问实例；KeyId可通过接口DescribeKeyPairs获取，密钥与密码不能同时指定，同时Windows操作系统不支持指定密钥。当前仅支持购买的时候指定一个密钥。"},"KeepImageLogin":{"type":"string","description":"保持镜像的原始设置。该参数与Password或KeyIds.N不能同时指定。只有使用自定义镜像、共享镜像或外部导入镜像创建实例时才能指定该参数为TRUE。取值范围： TRUE：表示保持镜像的登录设置 FALSE：表示不保持镜像的登录设置 默认取值：FALSE。"}}},"InstanceState":{"type":"string","description":"实例状态。取值范围： PENDING：表示创建中 LAUNCH_FAILED：表示创建失败 RUNNING：表示运行中 STOPPED：表示关机 STARTING：表示开机中 STOPPING：表示关机中 REBOOTING：表示重启中 SHUTDOWN：表示停止待销毁 TERMINATING：表示销毁中"},"Tags":{"type":"array","description":"实例关联的标签列表"},"StopChargingMode":{"type":"string","description":"例的关机计费模式。 取值范围： KEEP_CHARGING：关机继续收费 STOP_CHARGING：关机停止收费 NOT_APPLICABLE：实例处于非关机状态或者不适用关机停止计费的条件"}},"type":"object"}

list.title: 查询实例磁盘
list.req_body_other: {"properties":{"Region":{"type":"string","description":"地域ID"},"InstanceId":{"type":"string","description":"实例ID"},"DiskIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"磁盘ID列表"}},"type":"object"}
list.res_body: {"properties":{"DiskId":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘ID"},"DiskUsage":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘类型。取值范围： SYSTEM_DISK：系统盘 DATA_DISK：数据盘"},"DiskChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"付费模式。取值范围： PREPAID：预付费，即包年包月 POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：后付费，即按量计费"},"Portable":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否为弹性云盘，false表示非弹性云盘，true表示弹性云盘"},"Placement":{"properties":{"Zone":{"type":"string","description":""},"ProjectId":{"type":"number","description":""}}},"SnapshotAbility":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘是否具备创建快照的能力。取值范围： false表示不具备 true表示具备。"},"DiskName":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘名称"},"DiskSize":{"type":"number","description":"云硬盘大小，单位GB"},"DiskState":{"type":"string","description":"云盘状态。取值范围： UNATTACHED：未挂载 ATTACHING：挂载中 ATTACHED：已挂载 DETACHING：解挂中 EXPANDING：扩容中 ROLLBACKING：回滚中 TORECYCLE：待回收 DUMPING：拷贝硬盘中"},"DiskType":{"type":"string","description":"云盘介质类型。取值范围： CLOUD_BASIC：表示普通云硬 CLOUD_PREMIUM：表示高性能云硬盘 CLOUD_SSD：SSD表示SSD云硬盘"},"Attached":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘是否挂载到云主机上。取值范围： false:表示未挂载 true:表示已挂载"},"InstanceId":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘挂载的云主机ID"},"CreateTime":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘的创建时间"},"DeadlineTime":{"type":"string","description":"云硬盘的到期时间"},"Rollbacking":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘是否处于快照回滚状态。取值范围： false:表示不处于快照回滚状态 true:表示处于快照回滚状态"},"RollbackPercent":{"type":"number","description":"云盘快照回滚的进度"},"Encrypt":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘是否为加密盘。取值范围： false:表示非加密盘 true:表示加密盘"},"AutoRenewFlagError":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘已挂载到子机，且子机与云盘都是包年包月。 true：子机设置了自动续费标识，但云盘未设置 false：云盘自动续费标识正常"},"RenewFlag":{"type":"string","description":"自动续费标识。取值范围： NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW：通知过期且自动续费 NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：通知过期不自动续费 DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：不通知过期不自动续费"},"DeadlineError":{"type":"boolean","description":"在云盘已挂载到实例，且实例与云盘都是包年包月的条件下，此字段才有意义。 true:云盘到期时间早于实例。 false：云盘到期时间晚于实例"},"IsReturnable":{"type":"boolean","description":"判断预付费的云盘是否支持主动退还。 true:支持主动退还 false:不支持主动退还"},"ReturnFailCode":{"type":"number","description":"预付费云盘在不支持主动退还的情况下，该参数表明不支持主动退还的具体原因。取值范围： 1：云硬盘已经退还 2：云硬盘已过期 3：云盘不支持退还 8：超过可退还数量的限制"},"AutoSnapshotPolicyIds":{"type":"string","description":"云盘关联的定期快照ID。只有在调用DescribeDisks接口时，入参ReturnBindAutoSnapshotPolicy取值为TRUE才会返回该参数。"},"Tags":{"type":"array","description":"与云盘绑定的标签，云盘未绑定标签则取值为空"},"DeleteWithInstance":{"type":"boolean","description":"云盘是否与挂载的实例一起销毁。 true:销毁实例时会同时销毁云盘，只支持按小时后付费云盘。 false：销毁实例时不销毁云盘。"},"DifferDaysOfDeadline":{"type":"string","description":"当前时间距离盘到期的天数（仅对预付费盘有意义）"}},"type":"object"}

{"properties":{"Placement":{"properties":{"Zone":{"type":"string","description":"实例所属的可用区ID"},"ProjectId":{"type":"number","description":"实例所属项目ID"},"HostIds":{"type":"string","description":"实例所属的专用宿主机ID列表"}}},"InstanceId":{"type":"string","description":"实例ID"},"InstanceType":{"type":"string","description":"实例机型"},"CPU":{"type":"number","description":"实例的CPU核数，单位：核"},"Memory":{"type":"number","description":"实例内存容量，单位：GB"},"RestrictState":{"type":"string","description":"实例业务状态。取值范围： NORMAL：表示正常状态的实例 EXPIRED：表示过期的实例 PROTECTIVELY_ISOLATED：表示被安全隔离的实例。"},"InstanceName":{"type":"string","description":"实例名称"},"InstanceChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"实例计费模式。取值范围： PREPAID：表示预付费，即包年包月 POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：表示后付费，即按量计费 CDHPAID：CDH付费，即只对CDH计费，不对CDH上的实例计费"},"SystemDisk":{"properties":{"DiskType":{"type":"string","description":"系统盘类型。系统盘类型限制详见CVM实例配置。取值范围： LOCAL_BASIC：本地硬盘 LOCAL_SSD：本地SSD硬盘 CLOUD_BASIC：普通云硬盘 CLOUD_SSD：SSD云硬盘 CLOUD_PREMIUM：高性能云硬盘  默认取值：CLOUD_BASIC。"},"DiskId":{"type":"string","description":"系统盘ID。LOCAL_BASIC 和 LOCAL_SSD 类型没有ID。暂时不支持该参数"},"DiskSize":{"type":"number","description":"系统盘大小，单位：GB。默认值为 50"}}},"DataDisks":{"type":"string","description":"实例数据盘信息。只包含随实例购买的数据盘"},"PrivateIpAddresses":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例主网卡的内网IP列表。"},"PublicIpAddresses":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例主网卡的公网IP列表。"},"InternetAccessible":{"properties":{"InternetChargeType":{"type":"string","description":"网络计费类型。取值范围： BANDWIDTH_PREPAID：预付费按带宽结算 TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：流量按小时后付费 BANDWIDTH_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR：带宽按小时后付费 BANDWIDTH_PACKAGE：带宽包用户 默认取值：非带宽包用户默认与子机付费类型保持一致"},"InternetMaxBandwidthOut":{"type":"number","description":"公网出带宽上限，单位：Mbps。默认值：0Mbps。不同机型带宽上限范围不一致，具体限制详见购买网络带宽。"},"PublicIpAssigned":{"type":"string","description":"是否分配公网IP。取值范围： TRUE：表示分配公网IP FALSE：表示不分配公网IP  当公网带宽大于0Mbps时，可自由选择开通与否，默认开通公网IP；当公网带宽为0，则不允许分配公网IP。"}}},"VirtualPrivateCloud":{"properties":{"VpcId":{"type":"string","description":"vpc id"},"SubnetId":{"type":"string","description":"私有网络子网ID"},"AsVpcGateway":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否用作公网网关。公网网关只有在实例拥有公网IP以及处于私有网络下时才能正常使用。取值范围： TRUE：表示用作公网网关 FALSE：表示不用作公网网关  默认取值：FALSE"},"PrivateIpAddresses":{"type":"string","description":"私有网络子网 IP 数组"}}},"ImageId":{"type":"string","description":"生产实例所使用的镜像ID。"},"RenewFlag":{"type":"string","description":"自动续费标识。取值范围： NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：表示通知即将过期，但不自动续费 NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW：表示通知即将过期，而且自动续费 DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW：表示不通知即将过期，也不自动续费"},"CreatedTime":{"type":"string","description":"创建时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，并且使用UTC时间。格式为：YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ"},"ExpiredTime":{"type":"string","description":"到期时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，并且使用UTC时间。格式为：YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ"},"OsName":{"type":"string","description":"操作系统名称"},"SecurityGroupIds":{"type":"array[string]","description":"实例所属安全组"},"LoginSettings":{"properties":{"Password":{"type":"string","description":"实例登录密码"},"KeyIds":{"type":"string","description":"密钥ID列表"},"KeepImageLogin":{"type":"string","description":"保持镜像的原始设置"}}},"InstanceState":{"type":"string","description":"实例状态。取值范围： PENDING：表示创建中 LAUNCH_FAILED：表示创建失败 RUNNING：表示运行中 STOPPED：表示关机 STARTING：表示开机中 STOPPING：表示关机中 REBOOTING：表示重启中 SHUTDOWN：表示停止待销毁 TERMINATING：表示销毁中。"},"Tags":{"type":"array","description":"实例关联的标签列表"},"StopChargingMode":{"type":"string","description":"实例的关机计费模式。 取值范围： KEEP_CHARGING：关机继续收费 STOP_CHARGING：关机停止收费 NOT_APPLICABLE：实例处于非关机状态或者不适用关机停止计费的条件"}},"type":"object"}
